sentence: He took care of our dinner reservations every night and left goodies for us on different nights of our 9 day stay bottle of wine chocolate covered strawberries etc
My wife and I went away for a short weekend for her birthday and stayed in the adults only area which we highly recommend
will come back in june everything was above my expectation
She took good care of us when I know the heat and the large crowd did not make it easy
Great food great music the best staff giving you the best service
He was very nice but I can not really see needing this service if I were to come again
Soft musician in the evening at the open garden area
We did a jungle tour kayak paddle board paddle boat and wind surf there
Nice hotel close to downtown nice location
I definitely recommend Fuego and Vento
As a side note one of the big takeaways was the fact that staff members did not have their hands out asking for a tip whenever they served us or assisted us
After using the walker talkie radio to contact housekeeping the front desk staff told us to come back at 230
Obviously they will never assume the possibility of having contaminated fish on their restaurant but if I were you would think twice before giving your money to this group
Lunch was mostly from the burger joint by the pools
I brushed it off as maybe it was just that particular elevator but it ended up being all of them
It would had been a 5 Star property had the food been better
A manager anyways arrives out of no where and after 45 minutes internal discussion in spanish lady comes and say that Pablo was wrong and charges are not accurate
When we spoke to pool management all they said is they accommodated the other family so we should be okay now
Food at La Palapa was the best in the whole resort especially the shrimp on the lunch menu
we reached the checkin desk
